summary: This ENB was created for those who want their game to look both realistic and cinematic, without overdosing on bloom or colors.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#000000]VERSION 3!
This Version is more dark and cinematic, while sticking the the normal SugarSweet brown style. Looks Great, Performance is pretty good
(45-55 FPS on my GTX 770 and 35-40 in Grassy Areas)
For better performance, press Shift+Enter and turn ALL ANTI-AILIASING, EXCEPT EDGE AA OFF, the ENB uses injectSMAA so it won't look too different.[/color]
**********************************************************************************************************************************************************************************

[color=#00ff00]VERSION 2 IS OUT
This Version is more summer time/happier for greener, brighter days.[/color][/center][center]**********************************************************************************************************************************************************************************[color=#a61c00]
This ENB was created for those who want their game to look both realistic and cinematic, without overdosing on bloom or colors.[/color]
[color=#ffff00]The ENB Preset works well with enbseries [b]d3d9.dll v261 and v262[/b] [/color]
[color=#00ffff]All credits to creating ENB goes to Boris Voronstov.[/color][/center][img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/images/110/5144511-1408820943.jpg[/img]

[center][b][u][color=#ff7700][size=3]Features:[/size][/color][/u][/b]
[b][i][color=#ffd966]-Beautiful Cinematic Colors without breaking immersion and is lore-friendly
-High quality SSAO/SSIL with good performance
-Realistic Water effects
-Beautiful Lighting and Shadows
-Lovely Contrast that doesn't make anything too dark
-Nights and Interiors are not too dark and not too bright
-Cinematic Sharpening
-Cinematic LetterBox(optional)
-Cinematic Film Grain(optional)
-High Quality Anti-Ailiasing that gives Extreme Performance while still getting the job done.[/color][/i][/b]
********************************************************************************************************************
[b][size=3][color=#cc4125]This ENB will work similarly to ICEnhancer, every version varies in style. To know which version is which look at the first number of the file after "V"[/color]

[color=#000000]Example: V1 is Version 1, V1_5 is also Version 1, just with some fixes or improvements to the version[/color][/size][/b]

********************************************************************************************************************
[b][u][color=#ff7700][size=5]Requirements[/size][/color][/u][/b]

[color=#e06666][size=3][b]Included in Data:
- all ELE files I am using
-[u] INCLUDES DAWNGUARD, DRAGONBORN, AND HEARTHFIRE- IF YOU DO NOT HAVE DLC USE THE DATA FOLDER FOR NO DLC[/u]

YOU STILL NEED
- Enhanced Lights and FX
- ELFX Dawnguard and Dragonborn - if you have them
- Pure Weather
- Realistic Water 2 with ENB textures
- Watercolor for ENB[/b][/size]
[/color]


[color=#e69138][size=6]V1_3 OF THIS ENB DOES NOT USE ELFX and ELE!!! IT USES [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17609/?]RELIGHTING SKYRIM SERIES[/url]!!![/size][/color]


[color=#00ff00][b][u]Recommended System Specs:[/u][/b]
GTX650 or amd equivalent
Intel i7 930@2.8Ghz or amd equivalent
4-6GB of RAM[/color]
********************************************************************************************************************
[b][u][color=#ff7700][size=5]Install/Uninstall

TO INSTALL[/size][/color][/u][/b]

[color=#ffd966]1. Download ENB Series [/color][url=http://enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0262.html]v.261 or above from ENBdev[/url][color=#ffd966], (the download button is on the bottom).[/color]

[color=#ffd966]2. Extract [/color][b]ONLY the d3d9.dll and the enbhost.exe [/b][color=#ffd966]from the [/color][b]wrapper version [/b][color=#ffd966]to your Skyrim directory, (by default at C:Program Files (x86)/Steam/SteamApps/common/Skyrim).[/color]

[color=#ffd966]3. Place enb Files into the Skyrim directory[/color]

[color=#ea9999][size=3]THIS DOES NOT APPLY TO V1_3 ->[/size][/color][color=#cc4125][size=3] [/size][/color][color=#ffd966]4.If you have DLC(DAWNGUARD,DRAGONBORN,AND HEARTHFIRE) then place files from "Data(DLC 
Only) into skyrim data folder, if you do not have DLC then place files from "Data(IF YOU DON'T HAVE DLC)
into skyrim data folder.

5.Add optional files to skyrim directory if you want.

6. Add (or modify) these lines to your [b]SkyrimPrefs.ini[/b] file (located by default in C:/Users/xxxxxxx/Documents/My Games/Skyrim)
bFloatPointRenderTarget=1
bTreesReceiveShadows=1
bDrawLandShadows=1
bShadowsOnGrass=1

7. Open your Skyrim Launcher (NOT SKSE) and diasable ALL Anti-Aliasing and Anisotropic Filtering

8. Set your enblocal.ini file for these two lines- [url=http://wiki.step-project.com/Guide:ENB#tab=Installation]For a tutorial Go here[/url]:
ReservedMemorySizeMb=xxx
VideoMemorySizeMb=xxxx[/color]

[b][u][color=#ff7700][size=5]TO UNINSTALL[/size][/color][/u][/b]
[color=#ffd966]Delete all files you added from the enb(including the ELE files)[/color]
***********************************************************************************************************************
[b][u][color=#ff7700][size=4]Recommended Mods (All my graphics mods as of Dec. 2014)[/size][/color][/u][/b]

[color=#6aa84f]
Skyrim HD 2K
Verdant - Grass Plugin
Towns and Villages Enhanced / JK's Towns / Beautiful Whiterun
Relighting Skyrim
Lorkhan's Vision V1
Enhanced Blood Textures
Quality Snow 4K
Static Mesh Improvement Mod
Skyfalls+Skymills - Animated Distant Waterfalls and WindMills
Skyfix - Unique Inn Signs HD
Serious HD Retexture Skyrim
Ultimate HD Fire Effects
Revamped Exterior Fog
Wet and Cold
Unbelievable Grasses
Trees_HD Skyrim Variation (only for dead trees in north of Skyrim, nothing else)
CM_Bark (NLA ENB OPTIONAL TEXTURES) OR Cover Woods (these mods must overlap with Trees_HD Skyrim Variation)[/color]
***************************************************************************************************************************
[b][u][size=4][color=#ff7700]Credits[/color]
[/size][/u][/b][color=#000000]- Boris Voronstov-For making ENB Series
- BerenBeren-For making Original SugarSweet ENB
- ChewieMuse-for the original Beauty of Skyrim ENB
- Kyokushinoyama-For permission to use his sunsprite and DoF files
- ZenonSeth-For his work on the water and subsurface scattering[/color][/center]
author: TheDrDocter - BerenOneHanded
